Package com.comp2059.app.boss

Class Boss

java.lang.Object
com.comp2059.app.boss.Boss
public class Boss extends Object
The type Boss. This class is used to create a object. Once it is destroyed, It will generate a property.

    • getInstance

      Returns:
      the boss

    • createBoss

      public void createBoss​(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root)
      Create a boss in a different game score situation and put them in a random place on the scene. 0, 50 to 60 and 100 to 110 scores will generate a boss.
      Parameters:
      root - the root

    • collide

      public void collide​(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root)
      Collide with laser beam. If the lives become zero, Boss will be destroyed with explosion gif and game score will plus 1. If not collide, the weapons laser beam will be removed from the scene.
      Parameters:
      root - the root
